name: Checkout-Field-Manager
author: Dinura Sellapperuma

sections.description: Sms Sender by D I X Y is a simple yet powerful plugin to send SMS directly from your WordPress dashboard. It provides an easy-to-use interface for sending individual or bulk SMS messages, making it perfect for notifications, marketing campaigns, or any situation where you need to reach your audience quickly.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/checkout-field-manager directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Settings -> SMS Sender screen to configure the plugin. You'll need to enter your API key and sender mask.
  4. You're ready to start sending SMS!
sections.screenshots:
1. Main settings page where you configure your API key and sender mask.
  2. SMS sending interface for composing and sending messages.
  3. Balance checking page to monitor your SMS credit.
sections.changelog:
1.9.1 - July 27, 2024

  • Added compatibility with WordPress 6.6.1
  • Improved error handling for API requests
sections.faq:
How to setup this?

You can go to wordpress setting icon setting>checkout-field-manager.

upgrade_notice: 1.9 Version adds compatibility with WordPress 6.6.1 and fixes several minor bugs. It's recommended to update to ensure smooth operation with the latest WordPress version.
